TopicTitle: Dman1791's Jets and Replicas (Currently only the PAK-FA) (Pictures coming SoonÃ¢â€žÂ¢)

Articles.Content:
Note: Most craft will use BDArmory, QuizTech Aerospace, and, for Russian (or Russian-inspired) aircraft, the P.E.W. expansion for BDArmory.

PAK-KA (PAK-FA AKA T-50)

This is the first craft I've made that I deemed worthy of being posted. It's highly maneuverable and carries a heavy AA armament. I had to use a few tricks with tweakscale and what could have been a bug in MFT to get high capacity, low size fuel tanks. Darn fuel-guzzling turbos! This is my favorite of the craft I've built.

Feedback is much appreciated!

Edited August 13, 2015 by Dman1791
I would love GIANT bombers, I have not seen a lot of them here.
